function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases via IoT devices in large buildings or campuses.","Impact":"Risk of widespread disease transmission, increased infection rates, and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of IoT devices, implementation of contactless technologies, and strict hygiene protocols.","Technologies":"Contactless sensors, UV-C disinfection, and antimicrobial coatings for devices.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance teams, and health authorities."}]}
